billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Provides residency requirements for sex offenders
summary: Provides residency requirements for sex offenders including criminal sanctions for violations; prohibits sex offenders from residing in a residence that is within one thousand feet from any school building regularly used for instructional purposes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to certain residency requirements for sex offenders
